alert.note: Alert for Butler; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 02 at 2:59AM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to four tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Iowa, Harrison County. In Nebraska, Washington and Butler Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
